Class Projectile

  • java.lang.Object
    • Projectile

  • public class Projectile
extends java.lang.Object
    Object used to hit the targets near the faculty. This class contains an image for the projectile, x and y position coordinates, the speed/velocity of projection, whether or not its been fired, the direction in which it is moving, and methods that those attributes.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) Direction direction
      Holds the direction position for this projectile and initiates it Direction.FORWARD
      (package private) boolean fired
      States whether this projectile has been fired or not.

      Constructors

      Constructor that sets the projectile image and starting x and y coordinates.

          int xPosition,

        Constructor that sets the projectile image and starting x and y coordinates.
        Parameters:
        fileName - File image used to represent a projectile.
        xPosition - Starting x position of the projectile.
        yPosition - Starting y position of the projectile.
